title: Scenario: User launches app for the first time
custom_preconds: Given the app has never been installed
custom_steps:
When the user installs the app
And launches the app for the first time
custom_expected: Then the user will be prompted with a modal asking them to choose a team from either of three sections: MLB Affiliate, MILB Class or View all MiLB Teams

title: Scenario: User launches app for the first time and does NOT choose a favorite team.
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app has NOT yet been launched
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app
And chooses the Class of Favorite Team(MLB Affiliate, AAA, AA, A) 
And the user chooses NOT to add a favorite team
custom_expected: Then the modal will close and the user will be left on the Scoreboard with the app in Triple-A mode

title: Scenario: User launches app for the first time and chooses to add a favorite team
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app has NOT yet been launched
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app
And chooses the Class of Favorite Team(MLB Affiliate, AAA, AA, A) 
And chooses a team 
And taps the 'Done' button on the upper right
custom_expected:
Then the user should be taken directly to that team's page
And the corresponding logo of the team chosen is on the lower left

title: Scenario: User launches app for the first time and chooses favorite team in Triple-A
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app has NOT yet been launched
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app
And the user chooses Triple-A as the Favorite Team Class
And is presented with the Triple-A Favorite Team modal
And adds at least one favorite team 
And taps the 'Done' button
custom_expected:
Then the user should be taken directly to that team's page
And the corresponding logo of the team chosen is on the lower left

title: Scenario: User launches app for the first time and gets bubble message for class picker
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app has NOT yet been launched
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app for the first time
AND when the user goes to the scoreboard for the first time
custom_expected:
THEN the user will get a bubble message pointing to the Class picker on the top center 
AND the bubble message will list all the classes(Triple A, Double A, Class A Advanced, Class A, Class A short season, and Rookie)
